      • generateMaze

        public static boolean[][] generateMaze(int width,
                                       int height,
                                       int startX,
                                       int startY)
        Generates a two dimensional maze given a width, height, startX and startY positions for starting the maze. If the startX or startY are even, then they will be walled.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the maze
        height - the height of the maze
        startX - the starting x location for the maze
        startY - the starting y location for the maze
        Returns:
        a two dimensional maze

      • generateMaze

        public static boolean[][] generateMaze(int width,
                                       int height,
                                       int startX,
                                       int startY,
                                       MazeGenerator.GENERATION_STYLE style,
                                       double styleIntensity)

      • generateMaze

        public static void generateMaze(boolean[][] maze,
                                int x,
                                int y)
        The recursive method used to generate a 2d maze. When making a new array, set the array elements to false by default, except the location at (x, y).
        Parameters:
        maze - the two dimensional maze to run on
        x - the current x position
        y - the current y position

      • generateMaze

        public static void generateMaze(boolean[][] maze,
                                int x,
                                int y,
                                MazeGenerator.GENERATION_STYLE style,
                                double styleIntensity)

      • generateMaze

        public static boolean[][][] generateMaze(int width,
                                         int height,
                                         int depth)
        Generates a three dimensional maze given a width, height and depth.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the maze
        height - the height of the maze
        depth - the depth of the maze
        Returns:
        a three dimensional maze

      • generateMaze

        public static boolean[][][] generateMaze(int width,
                                         int height,
                                         int depth,
                                         int startX,
                                         int startY,
                                         int startZ)
        Generates a three dimensional maze given a width, height, depth, startX, startY, and startZ positions for starting the maze. If the startX, startY, or startZ are even, then they will be walled.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the maze
        height - the height of the maze
        depth - the depth of the maze
        startX - the starting x location for the maze
        startY - the starting y location for the maze
        startZ - the starting z location for the maze
        Returns:
        a three dimensional maze

      • generateMaze

        public static void generateMaze(boolean[][][] maze,
                                int x,
                                int y,
                                int z)
        The recursive method used to generate a 3d maze. When making a new array, set the array elements to false by default, except the location at (x, y, z).
        Parameters:
        maze - the two dimensional maze to run on
        x - the current x position
        y - the current y position
        z - the current z position

      • getRanDs

        public static int[] getRanDs(int num)
        Returns an array of ints from 0 to num-1 of length num, in a random order
        Parameters:
        num - the length of the array
        Returns:
        an array of ints

      • saveImage

        public static void saveImage(boolean[][] maze,
                             java.lang.String imageloc)
        Saves an two dimensional maze as a png image
        Parameters:
        maze - the two dimensional array
        imageloc - the location to save it to (include ".png")
